articles.title: Pro-Donald Trump group spends more than $40m on legal fees - BBC
articles.description: Legal bills now far exceed Save America PAC's other expenses - and they are set to keep growing.
articles.content:
The primary fundraising and political spending group supporting Donald Trump has spent more than $40m (£31m) on legal fees so far this year.
That money, due to be confirmed in a financial filing on … [+5302 chars]
